questions.question: The damping ratio and peak overshoot are the measures of speed response of the system.
Multiple poles on the imaginary axis makes the system stable

explanations.a: The output won't increases without bond

questions.question: The impulse response of the system has a single pole at origin is decaying exponentially.
When the period of the observation is large the type of the error will be _____.
The steady state error can be reduced by increasing the input to the system.

explanations.a: steady-state error is inversely proportional to the gain
explanations.b: steady-state error is  not inversely proportional to the gain
